name: Silva Trail Runner Free Headlamp
description: The Trail Runner Free is a light and streamlined headlamp that exists to illuminate your low-light runs. Equipped with Silva’s intelligent lighting optics, it offers a mix of flood and spot lighting, letting you see where you're headed and where you are.Free Technology™ integrates the cord, between the battery pack and the light, into the headband, so there is nothing to snag or bounce around.4 modes: high (400 lumens), medium (200 lumens), low (50 lumens) and flash.Intelligent lighting combines flood and spot lighting, covering the near and the far.Hybrid battery case give you options: the convenience of 3 AAA batteries (included), or pick-up a Hybrid USB-powered pack (not included) for easy USB charging.Battery extension cord gives you the option of putting the battery pack in your bag or inside a jacket pocket. This both removes weight from your head and lets you keep the batteries warm for better cold-weather performance.Included hybrid battery case has a rear facing red light that helps keep you seen.Anti-slip headband stays in place when on the move.Large, 1-button interface is easy to use with or without gloves.Lumens and runtimes measured to the ANSI/NEMA FL1 standard.IPX5 waterproofing stands up to any weather you’re willing to go out in.In the box: Trail Runner Free headlamp, Hybrid 3 x AAA battery case, cloth wrapped extension cable and manual.

Batteries: 3 AAA (included) or rechargeable battery pack (not included)
